title: State vs. Ramesh Kumar
summary: Conviction upheld for dowry harassment where victim's suicide note and neighbors' testimonies established persistent demands for car and cash.

title: Vinod Khanna vs. CBI
summary: Acquittal in money laundering case as prosecution failed to trace alleged 'proceeds of crime' to any predicate offense.

title: Meena Devi vs. State of Rajasthan
summary: Landmark ruling recognizing marital rape within forced cohabitation. Court awarded compensation while noting legislative gap in IPC.

title: Indian Navy vs. Contractor Pvt. Ltd.
summary: Arbitration award set aside due to violation of defense procurement guidelines. Court mandated blacklisting of contractor.
